description: Weak preference orderings of n alternatives, i.e. orderings that have indifference between at least two alternatives.
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[(-1)^(j-i)*Binomial[j, i]*i^n, {i, 0, n-1}, {j, 0, n-1}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 21}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 26 2016, after _Peter Luschny_ *)
prog: (Sage)def A019472(n):    return add(add((-1)^(j-i)*binomial(j, i)*i^n for i in range(n)) for j in range(n))[A019472(n) for n in range(21)] # _Peter Luschny_, Jul 22 2014
author: Robert Ware (bware(AT)wam.umd.edu)
extensions: Formula corrected by Eugene McDonnell, May 12 2000
